item.title: Trump’s Woke DEA Pick Arrested Christian Pastor, Released Criminals, Penalized Unvaccinated Employees
item.description: Chad Chronister doesn't belong anywhere near a position of power.

item.title: Trump Should Pardon Victims Of Dems’ J6 Lawfare On Day One
item.description: Trump could and should pardon the J6 political prisoners as one of his first acts in office, or at least commute sentences.

item.title: Why Are Cops Still Arresting Parents Who Let Their Kids Roam?
item.description: A 41-year-old mother was handcuffed, put in the back of a cruiser, and taken to jail for letting her 10-year-old son walk a mile from home.

item.title: Why International Arrest Warrants For Netanyahu And Putin Are Anti-Democracy Legal Garbage

item.title: Hunter Biden’s Pardon Is All About Protecting Joe Biden, Not His Son
item.description: By pardoning his son for more than a decade of potential crimes, the president is protecting himself above all.
